title: Fairmount Remodeled Rowhome for Rent - May 1, 2023 - 2 beds/1.5 bath
description: Beautiful, 2-story updated townhouse in desirable Fairmount section of Philadelphia. Powder room on the first floor! Open floor plan on the first floor from living room all the way back to the kitchen. Backyard perfect for grilling and some outdoor furniture! 1000+ square feet, central air/heat with Nest Thermostat. When you enter the home, you will walk into a bright spacious living area with new floors throughout, a powder room, and full kitchen in the back with newer stainless steel appliances (refrigerator, dishwasher, range, and microwave). Upstairs you will find 3 rooms - 2 are a good size bedrooms and 1 is BONUS room - best for an office or baby room. The full bathroom is on the second floor. The unfinished basement has plenty of room for storage and a brand newer washer and dryer with a utility sink. Backyard is fenced in - perfect for grilling and outdoor furniture set-up. Street parking is available in the neighborhood. Great for families, couples, or 2 roommates, etc! Very close to culture and museums (Art Museum, Barnes, etc.), tons of great restaurants and bars, and public transportation close (buses and trolleys). $2250/month - 12 month+ lease term. Apply through Zillow directly. *Agents - please contact us on behalf of your clients.

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square
description:
This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home at 812 on the 8th floor features large windows that face south and have a Chancellor Street view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home at 812 on 8th floor
* All utilities, except cable and internet, are included
* Large south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* Neutral carpet
* Renovated kitchen
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Granite kitchen counters
* White kitchen cabinets
* Renovated bathroom
Community Amenities:
* Historic building on the park at Rittenhouse Square
* Guest suites
* Bicycle storage in the attached parking garage
* Front door attendant
* Concierge
* 8,000-square-foot lounge with cozy seating areas, vintage pool table, private conference room, and demonstration kitchen
* Fitness center
* Sauna
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Dog spa in this pet-friendly community! Certain restrictions apply.
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Laundry room on every floor
* 3rd floor laundry room! No quarters! Rechargeable laundry card!
* Elevator building with front door attendant and front desk concierge
* Online resident portal RentCafe for maintenance requests, rent payments, lease renewals, and more
* On-site maintenance 24/7
* Attached valet parking garage! Parking spaces not managed by community, so the cost is separate.
* Roof deck under renovation
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, and Giant. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Via Locusta, Schlesinger's, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, a.kitchen, The Dandelion, Pizzeria Vetri, The Continental Mid-town, Kura Sushi, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Marathon on the Square. Indulge a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Pick up a sticky bun, scone, cookie, or brookie at The Bakeshop on 20th. Select a bottle of wine at one of the two nearby locations of Fine Wine & Good Spirits. Have a facial at Rescue Spa. Check out the latest exhibition at the Franklin Institute. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!
Wondering if this home is still available for rent? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 812 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate at rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price is for the 22 month lease term. For an unfurnished home, 2 to 22 month lease terms are available!
Price depends upon lease term as well as move-in date. Check out our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com for pricing on each home!

Welcome home!

description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. title: Beautiful courtyards, Seasonal Bike Share Program, Elevator building
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home in Building on Rittenhouse Square
description:
This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home at 806 on the 8th floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers such as BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as March 20, 2023!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Maxx's Produce, Food & Friends, and Spruce Food Market. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Via Locusta, Schlesinger's, P.S. & Co., Max Brenner, Harp & Crown, Pietro's, a.kitchen, Scarpetta, The Dandelion, Veda, The Continental Mid-town, Village Whiskey, Wilder Restaurant, Pizzeria Vetri, Spice Finch, Friday Saturday Sunday, and Trattoria Carina. Buy a loaf of bread or an almond croissant at Metropolitan Bakery. Pick up a scone or bar at The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a manicure at Fleur d'Or Nail Bar & Art. This building is close to the theaters on the Avenue of the Arts. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home at 806 on 8th floor
* All utilities, except cable and internet, are included
* Large north-facing windows with city skyline view
* Renovated kitchen with granite counters
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Dishwasher
* Garbage disposal
* Renovated bathroom with white tile
* Neutral carpet
Community Amenities:
* Historic building on the park at Rittenhouse Square
* 8,000-square-foot lounge with pool table and conference room
* Fitness center with park view
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Dog spa
* Guest suites
* Package room
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry room on 3rd floor
* Elevator building with front door attendant and concierge
* Online resident portal
* On-site maintenance
* Bicycle storage
* Attached valet parking garage! Parking spaces not managed by community, so the cost is separate.
* Roof deck under renovation
We can furnish a home for you over two weeks following rental application approval and after the home is made ready. Please note that there is a three-month lease term minimum for a furnished home. You would pay a furnished rent.
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 806 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate at rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Rittenhouse Claridge
Price is for the 22 month lease term. 2 to 22 month lease terms are available!
Rent depends upon lease term and move-in date. Check out our website for current pricing!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: Located in the Heart of Fishtown
description:
It is my distinguished honor to present to you 436 E. Thompson St. available for immediate occupancy. Located in the Heart of Fishtown, along the Delaware River, anchored by Commercial Mixed Use Corridors, including South St, and surrounded by residential properties, this property is situated at the intersection of a quaint & quiet neighborhood. This 3 story new construction townhouse features high end finishes and rooftop space. There is currently an occupant in the building and we are searching for 2 additional roommates. There is a 1 bedroom with a shared bathroom on the 2nd floor renting for $1050/month and a 3rd story bedroom loft with private en suite bathroom renting for $1475/month. All occupants will have access to the rooftop and backyard space and common living area (kitchen, living room, and dining room) The main floor features hardwood floors with high end finishes and lacquer cabinetry & open space that leads into a private backyard space. The property is filled with radiant natural light and illumination from large windows. Walk upstairs to the 2nd floor with 2 bedrooms and a shared bathroom. Continue up the winding staircase to the 3rd story bedroom loft with intricate dimensions and angles allowing for extra ceiling height. The 3rd floor has a loft bedroom and private en suite bathroom. The property is close to bus stops and close to multi-modal public transportation, commercial mixed used corridors with many retail businesses, food establishment, and other entertainment and amenities. To apply, we are running credit reports, criminal backgrounds, eviction history, and reviewing all income & financial documentation. If you are selected as a tenant, we will collect first, last & security deposit(one month). There are no minimum score requirements. The entire financial and credit profile will be reviewed in its entirety to determine application viability. We look forward to doing business with you and we will ensure a smooth, efficient, and professional process for all parties. Thank you for the opportunity to showcase this home and we wish you the best of luck in your home search.

title: ***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.***
description:
***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.*** Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its own DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using it’s smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheel chair accessibility and new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. Mail room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 3rd floor where you’ll find unit 304. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hard wood flooring, loft, and brick exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of it’s high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. Your master bedroom includes a large closet and master bath! Make sure you stop by the fitness center and bicycle + skateboard storage room located on level B. Enjoy the tour!
1217-35 Spring Garden St #304

title: Welcome to 809 N 17th St (Unit 1) in the heart of Fairmount
description:
Welcome to 809 N 17th St (Unit 1) in the heart of Fairmount. This beautiful new construction rental is huge and has 3 bedrooms | 3 baths. This one doesn't disappoint. This unit is huge and bigger than most rentals in this area and has two living room areas. Come see for yourself! Unit includes in-unit washer/dryer, open concept living/kitchen, stainless steel appliances (fridge, stove, dishwasher, microwave) and quartz countertops. It comes with all the extras as well, from surround sound built in speaker system in the main living area to smart thermostat and security system and plenty of closet/storage space throughout. What a great block and area to live in. The Francisville playground is steps away and you are a short walk to Fairmount Ave to experience all the dining, coffee shops and retail the area has to offer. Call for more info and to schedule a tour of the unit.

title: Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood
description:
Welcome to 1705 Spruce St! Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood, these new 2021 full gut-rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic district. With construction finalized in 2021, these brand-new units offer high-end appliances, plenty of closet space, and lovely views. With seven (7) available units, there are a variety of floorplans available for those seeking either a studio or 1-bedroom. You won’t have to worry about laundry, as each apartment has access to laundry on the first floor and some select floor-plans offer an in-unit washer/dryer! With so many attractions nearby, this location is the epitome of ideal: steps away from Rittenhouse Park, Starbucks, restaurants, shopping, and so much more. Transportation is a breeze, with countless bus routes around the corner and just a quick stroll to the BSL. We have three featured units at the moment, but you can find the floor-plans for all units throughout this website. For questions or to request a tour, please contact the Philly Home Advisors! Unit 1R is approximately 300 sq ft offering a kitchen with brand new stainless-steel appliances, dishwasher, and quartz countertops. With lots of cabinetry, there is plenty of storage! The bathroom includes a shower/tub combo, new vanity, and gorgeous modern tiling. The bedroom offers a comfortable space, lots of natural lighting, and a nicely sized closet. This 1-bed, 1-bath is offered at $1,395 a month, plus the cost of utilities. Located right outside the unit is the communal laundry, where two (2) sets of free washers and dryers are found for the tenant’s convenience.
1705 Spruce St #2

title: Loft-style One Bedroom in a Boutique Rittenhouse Building!
description:
Rare, HUGE (1300 SQFT!), loft-style one bedroom in a boutique Rittenhouse building. Plenty of room for a work from home scenario if need be. Elegant with tall ceilings through-out, hardwood floors, great windows for natural light, dining room and open kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. The spacious bedroom has lovely french doors and two sizable closets. Additionally, there is extra storage and private brand new laundry in the basement (directly accessible from the unit). Perfectly located in the desirable Rittenhouse Square Area, this home is in the heart of Center City with fine dining, one-of-a-kind shopping, exciting nightlife, and world-renowned cultural destinations. The campuses of Penn and Drexel, 30th Street Station and major hospitals are all minutes away. No pets. Tenant pays electric, water and gas included. Available asap! Landlord prefers at least 15 month lease. First, last and 1 month security due at signing.

title: Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia
description:
Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia, and you'll be blocks from the center of nightlife in Logan Square and Rittenhouse Square. Unit features modern kitchens, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washers and dryers, breakfast bars, pendant lighting, tile backsplashes, wood plank flooring throughout, walk-in closets. Stunning city and museum views are offered in a variety of floor plans! Mainstreet Market and Caf , featuring gourmet coffee and tea and much more! Fitness center with Technogym equipment, Queenax boxing gym, yoga/spin studio with indoor/outdoor workout space. It boasts Philadelphia's largest pools, an art studio, fitness center with boxing gym, yoga/spin studio, social lounge with demonstration kitchen, gourmet market and cafe, outdoor lounge with fire pit, 24-hour concierge, 24/7 package acceptance, resident shuttle service to Center City and University City and more. Make Whole Foods as your second kitchen conveniently located just 1 block away. Our apartments are within one mile of several institutions of higher education: Drexel University, Temple University, University of Penn, CHOP, Moore college of Arts, Community College of Philadelphia. You won't find a better building to live with amenities in the Fairmount Area. Park Towne Place includes 948 apartment and penthouse homes within four high-rise towers. The community is nestled between green acres on the Benjamin Franklin Parkway in the heart of Center City Philadelphia's Museum District. Park Town. ** Prices and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **
2200 Benjamin Franklin Pkwy #0B-N1003

title: Welcome to 530 S 2nd St Fully Furnished Condo in Beautiful Condition!
description:
Welcome to 530 South 2nd Street, Unit 819 a fully furnished condo in beautiful condition! Walk into a newly renovated open concept kitchen, finished with new hardware and cabinetry designed for maximum storage. The kitchen is also equipped with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a spacious peninsula, perfect for dining and entertaining. Continue into the airy living room where you will find ample space for lounging on the couch or working at the newly custom built-in desk. The couch easily turns into a queen-size sleeper sofa, ideal for hosting friends or family overnight! Off the living room you will find the bedroom, recently fitted with new windows and stylish, yet practical, plantation shutters. The master closet was recently transformed into the ultimate dream closet! Designed by California Closets, no expense was spared to ensure that you will have more than enough space for your wardrobe. Also, off the living room you will find the bathroom with beautiful stone tile throughout, generous storage space, and a shower/tub completed with bath jets. Here you will also find your very own washer and dryer. Not only is the inside of this unit amazing, but the private covered balcony offering picturesque views of the city provides the perfect combination of indoor-outdoor living. This unit comes fully furnished, with all the furniture being in excellent condition. Also included is complete access to the gym in the building, an outdoor garden with seating, 24/7 security, and access to a covered parking garage with the option to rent a parking space. Located in the historic area of Society Hill, this unit is surrounded by charm and beauty. You also can't beat the convenience of being only steps away from award-winning restaurants, bars, coffee shops, bakeries, and more. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this penthouse unit in Abbotts Square your next home. Owner is related to the listing agent.
530-10 S 2nd St #819

title: This 2-bedroom New York-style loft condo is a real stunner!!!

** 2 Car PARKING ** This 2-bedroom New York-style loft condo is a real stunner!!! It is the premier unit in the Candy Factory Lofts. Light floods in the large and many windows at every time of day. The kitchen, dining area, and living room comprise the very large open floor plan with 14 ft. ceilings. There is a large coat closet/storage closet that also houses the laundry room just off the front hallway. The 2 Car PARKING is covered and gated!!! Common bike storage on the first floor. A short walk/ride takes you to all of Fishtown's new restaurants and shops. Easy walk to the Market-Frankford El and the trolley.

title: Be the first to live in this brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring
description:
Be the first to live in this brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia! This unit sits on the top floor of a beautifully restored carriage house. It is a stunning blend of industrial charm and modern sophistication. The spacious open-concept living space boasts vaulted exposed timber ceilings, large windows custom Anderson windows, and beautifully exposed brick walls that add character and warmth. The designer kitchen includes matte black cabinetry, a Samsung appliance package, and an oversized island with natural stone counters and backsplash! Perfect for entertaining guests or simply enjoying a meal at home. The living room is spacious, with plenty of natural light streaming in through the large windows, creating a bright and airy environment, coupled with exposed duct work running the length of the unit. Access control is through a Latch system, with full and total control via your mobile phone. Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Spring Arts, the property is located within walking distance to a brand new full-sized Giant grocer, gyms, cafes, hot new restaurants/bars, and concert venues! title: High Ceilings, On-Site Management, Resident Storage
description:
Bedrooms: 1Bathrooms: 1Square Feet: 622Date Available: 2023-02-10Address: 2501 Oakford StAt the seam of Graduate Hospital, Southwest Center City, Point Breeze, and Grays Ferry neighborhoods, Herringbone Lofts creates a new community stitching together old-world charm with modern amenities. Maintaining vintage-factory architecture, the exterior of the building includes generous industrial-style windows, and corten steel paneling. The sleek loft-style interiors feature high ceilings, chef’s kitchens, and sun-drenched open spaces. The various interior layouts present several living options, each providing a clean and timeless canvas ready for your personal touch. The main lobby invites residents and guests into a versatile live-work space containing a coffee bar and lounge, co-working spaces and conference room, and secured mail and package room. The penthouse suite of finely-crafted boutique amenities offers a thoughtfully-designed entertainment space, complete with a residents’ lounge, state-of-the-art fitness center, and a rooftop terrace with panoramic views of Philadelphia.
